level.heading: Definitions.
level.text: For the purposes of this subchapter, the term:
"Designation of agent" means a statement designating a registered agent, that is delivered to the Mayor for filing under § 29-104.11 by a nonregistered foreign entity or domestic nonfiling entity.
The public organic record of a domestic filing entity;
A statement of qualification of a domestic limited liability partnership;
A foreign registration statement filed pursuant to § 29-105.03; or
An designation of a registered agent.
Domestic or foreign unincorporated nonprofit association for which a designation of an agent is in effect;
Domestic nonfiling entity for which a designation of an agent has been filed; or
Nonregistered foreign entity for which a designation of an agent has been filed.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: The 2013 amendment by D.C. Law 19-210 rewrote the section.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-378
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Application of Law 19-210: Section 7 of D.C. Law 19-210 provided that the act shall apply as of January 1, 2012.
